code: @Manual{,   title = {multi: Utility Functions For Urban Morphometric Analyses},   author = {Anirudh Govind},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000,  https://anirudhgovind.github.io/multi/},   url = {https://github.com/anirudhgovind/multi}, }

what: Utility Functions For Urban Morphometric Analyses
title: Utility Functions For Urban Morphometric Analyses
text: multi provides utility functions make basic steps — cleaning street networks, creating spatial units, etc. — urban morphometric analyses easier.

title: Utility Functions For Urban Morphometric Analyses
text: can install development version multi GitHub :

what: Create street block spatial units. — st_create_streetblocks
title: Create street block spatial units. — st_create_streetblocks
text: Create street block spatial units.

title: Create street block spatial units. — st_create_streetblocks
Create street block spatial units. — st_create_streetblocks
text: x sf object LINESTRING geometries representing street network. boundary sf object POLYGON geometries representing extents study area. merge_threshold numeric; value represents smallest acceptable size spatial unit. Contiguous units iteratively merged value reached. skip process, set merge_threshold = NULL. verbose logical; FALSE status messages output.

title: Create street block spatial units. — st_create_streetblocks
text: sf object POLYGON geometries representing street block spatial units.

title: Create street block spatial units. — st_create_streetblocks
code: street_blocks <- st_create_streetblocks(x = bangalore_highways, boundary = bangalore_boundary, merge_threshold = 4050, verbose = FALSE) plot(street_blocks)

what: Extract connected streets from a data frame containing linestrings representing street networks. — st_extract_connected

title: Extract connected streets from a data frame containing linestrings representing street networks. — st_extract_connected
Extract connected streets from a data frame containing linestrings representing street networks. — st_extract_connected

title: Extract connected streets from a data frame containing linestrings representing street networks. — st_extract_connected

title: Extract connected streets from a data frame containing linestrings representing street networks. — st_extract_connected
code: connected_streets <- st_extract_connected(bangalore_highways) connected_streets #> Simple feature collection with 255 features and 1 field #> Geometry type: LINESTRING #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: 8636274 ymin: 1455129 xmax: 8637274 ymax: 1456129 #> Projected CRS: WGS 84 / Pseudo-Mercator #> First 10 features: #>      osm_id                       geometry #> 1   8687347 LINESTRING (8637260 1455223... #> 2  22893740 LINESTRING (8637007 1456054... #> 3  23076921 LINESTRING (8636610 1455603... #> 4  23076927 LINESTRING (8636984 1456016... #> 5  23076955 LINESTRING (8637108 1456058... #> 6  23081473 LINESTRING (8636605 1455577... #> 7  23081479 LINESTRING (8637002 1455170... #> 8  23081496 LINESTRING (8636419 1455285... #> 9  23081501 LINESTRING (8636307 1455334... #> 10 23081545 LINESTRING (8636274 1455293...

code: disconnected_streets <- st_extract_disconnected(bangalore_highways) disconnected_streets #> Simple feature collection with 3 features and 1 field #> Geometry type: LINESTRING #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: 8636274 ymin: 1455129 xmax: 8636787 ymax: 1455600 #> Projected CRS: WGS 84 / Pseudo-Mercator #>        osm_id                       geometry #> 11   23081548 LINESTRING (8636274 1455149... #> 193 367139321 LINESTRING (8636780 1455600... #> 254 995260037 LINESTRING (8636274 1455386...

title: Extract street intersections. — st_extract_intersections
text: Extract street intersections.

title: Extract street intersections. — st_extract_intersections
Extract street intersections. — st_extract_intersections
text: x sf object LINESTRING geometries representing street networks.

title: Extract street intersections. — st_extract_intersections
text: sf object POINT geometries representing street intersections.

title: Extract street intersections. — st_extract_intersections
code: intersections <- st_extract_intersections(bangalore_highways) #> Linking to GEOS 3.10.2, GDAL 3.4.1, PROJ 8.2.1; sf_use_s2() is TRUE plot(bangalore_highways) plot(intersections, add = TRUE)

title: Title — st_merge_spatial_units
Title — st_merge_spatial_units
text: x sf object POLYGON geometries representing spatial units merged. merge_threshold numeric; value represents smallest acceptable size spatial unit. Contiguous units iteratively merged value reached. skip process, set merge_threshold = NULL. verbose logical; FALSE status messages output.

title: Title — st_merge_spatial_units
text: sf object POLYGON geometries representing street block spatial units.
